targets.rawSql:
select  
	destination_cluster as "Destination Cluster", 
	case 
		when ((count(case when reachability = 'true' then 1 else null end) * 100) / count(*)) >= 90 then 2
		when (count(case when reachability = 'false' then 1 else null end) = count(*)) then 0
		else 1
	end as "Reachability"
from 
(
	SELECT r2.cluster_id, r2.cluster_name, r2.destination_cluster, r2.reachability, r2.reachability_type 
	from reachability_test_results r2 JOIN organizations o on r2.organization_id  = o.organization_id 
	where 
		o.organization_name  IN ('$OrganizationName') and
		r2.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
		$__timeFilter(r2.test_timestamp) and
		r2.host_name in ($HostName) and
		r2.reachability_type='udp' and
		r2.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and 
		r2.test_id in ($TestId)
	order by r2.destination_cluster 
) t
group by destination_cluster 
order by "Reachability" asc

select  
	destination_cluster as "Destination Cluster", 
	case 
		when ((count(case when reachability = 'true' then 1 else null end) * 100) / count(*)) >= 90 then 2
		when (count(case when reachability = 'false' then 1 else null end) = count(*)) then 0
		else 1
	end as "Reachability"
from 
(
	SELECT r2.cluster_id, r2.cluster_name, r2.destination_cluster, r2.reachability, r2.reachability_type 
	from reachability_test_results r2 JOIN organizations o on r2.organization_id  = o.organization_id 
	where 
		o.organization_name  IN ('$OrganizationName') and
		r2.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
		$__timeFilter(r2.test_timestamp) and
		r2.host_name in ($HostName) and
		r2.reachability_type='tcp' and
		r2.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and
		r2.test_id in ($TestId)
	order by r2.destination_cluster 
) t
group by destination_cluster 
order by "Reachability" asc

SELECT 
  r.test_timestamp as "time",
  r.port as "Port"
FROM reachability_test_results r join organizations o on r.organization_id = o.organization_id
WHERE 
  r.port in (
  	SELECT distinct port from reachability_test_results r join organizations o on r.organization_id = o.organization_id
  	where 
  		o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
  		r.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
  		r.host_name in ($HostName) and 
  		r.reachability='true' and 
  		r.reachability_type = 'udp' and
  		r.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and
  		r.port = 5004 and
  		$__timeFilter(test_timestamp)
  ) and
  $__timeFilter(test_timestamp) and
  o.organization_name IN ('$OrganizationName') and
  r.cluster_name IN ($ClusterName) and
  r.destination_cluster IN ($DestinationCluster) and
  r.host_name IN ($HostName) and 
  r.reachability='true' and 
  r.reachability_type = 'udp' and
  r.test_id in ($TestId) and
  r.trigger_type in ($TriggerType)
group by r.port, r.test_timestamp
order by "time"

SELECT 
  r.test_timestamp as "time",
  r.port as "Port"
FROM reachability_test_results r join organizations o on r.organization_id = o.organization_id
WHERE 
  r.port in (
  	SELECT distinct port from reachability_test_results r join organizations o on r.organization_id = o.organization_id
  	where 
  		o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
  		r.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
  		r.host_name in ($HostName) and 
  		r.reachability='false' and 
  		r.reachability_type = 'udp' and
  		r.port > 50000 and
  		$__timeFilter(test_timestamp)
  ) and
  $__timeFilter(test_timestamp) and
  o.organization_name IN ('$OrganizationName') and
  r.cluster_name IN ($ClusterName) and
  r.destination_cluster IN ($DestinationCluster) and
  r.host_name IN ($HostName) and 
  r.reachability='false' and 
  r.reachability_type = 'udp' and
  r.test_id in ($TestId) and
  r.trigger_type in ($TriggerType)
group by r.port, r.test_timestamp
order by "time"

SELECT 
  r.test_timestamp as "time",
  r.port as "Port"
FROM reachability_test_results r join organizations o on r.organization_id = o.organization_id
WHERE 
  r.port in (
  	SELECT distinct port from reachability_test_results r join organizations o on r.organization_id = o.organization_id
  	where 
  		o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
  		r.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
  		r.host_name in ($HostName) and 
  		r.reachability='true' and 
  		r.reachability_type = 'udp' and
  		r.port > 50000 and
  		$__timeFilter(test_timestamp) and r.trigger_type in ($TriggerType)
  ) and
  $__timeFilter(test_timestamp) and
  o.organization_name IN ('$OrganizationName') and
  r.cluster_name IN ($ClusterName) and
  r.destination_cluster IN ($DestinationCluster) and
  r.host_name IN ($HostName) and 
  r.reachability='true' and 
  r.test_id in ($TestId) and
  r.reachability_type = 'udp' and r.trigger_type in ($TriggerType)
group by r.port, r.test_timestamp
order by "time"

SELECT

  		r.host_name in ($HostName) and 
  		r.reachability='false' and

  		r.port = 5004 and

  $__timeFilter(test_timestamp) and
  o.organization_name IN ('$OrganizationName') and
  r.cluster_name IN ($ClusterName) and
  r.destination_cluster IN ($DestinationCluster) and
  r.host_name IN ($HostName) and 
  r.reachability='false' and 
  r.test_id in ($TestId) and
  r.reachability_type = 'udp'
group by r.port, r.test_timestamp
order by "time"

SELECT 
  r.test_timestamp as "time",
  r.port as "Port"
FROM reachability_test_results r join organizations o on r.organization_id = o.organization_id
WHERE 
  r.port in (
  	SELECT distinct port from reachability_test_results r join organizations o on r.organization_id = o.organization_id
  	where 
  		o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
  		r.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
  		r.host_name in ($HostName) and

select r.timestamp as "Timestamp", r.organization_id as "Organization ID", r.cluster_name as "Cluster_Name", r.host_name as "Host Name", r.destination_cluster as "Destination Cluster", r.test_timestamp as "Test Time", r.trigger_type as "Trigger Type", r.reachability_type as "Reachability Type", r.port as "Port", r.reachability as "Reachability"
from reachability_test_results r join organizations o on r.organization_id = o.organization_id
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and r.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and r.host_name in ($HostName) and r.reachability_type='udp' and $__timeFilter(r.test_timestamp) and r.test_id in ($TestId) and r.trigger_type in ($TriggerType)

select r.timestamp as "Timestamp", r.organization_id as "Organization ID", r.cluster_name as "Cluster Name", r.host_name as "Host Name", r.destination_cluster as "Destination Cluster", r.test_timestamp as "Test Time", r.trigger_type as "Trigger Type", r.reachability_type as "Reachability Type", r.port as "Port", r.reachability as "Reachability"
from reachability_test_results r join organizations o on r.organization_id = o.organization_id
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and r.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and r.host_name in ($HostName) and r.reachability_type='tcp' and $__timeFilter(r.test_timestamp) and r.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and r.test_id in ($TestId)

list.definition:
select distinct cluster_name from reachability_test_results cd join organizations o on cd.organization_id = o.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName')
list.label: Select Cluster Name
list.name: ClusterName
list.query:
select distinct cluster_name from reachability_test_results cd join organizations o on cd.organization_id = o.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName')

list.definition:
select distinct host_name from reachability_test_results 
where cluster_name in ($ClusterName)
list.label: Select Host Name
list.name: HostName
list.query:
select distinct host_name from reachability_test_results 
where cluster_name in ($ClusterName)

list.definition:
select distinct rtr.destination_cluster from 
reachability_test_results rtr join organizations o on o.organization_id = rtr.organization_id 
where o.organization_name  IN ('$OrganizationName') and
rtr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
rtr.host_name in ($HostName)
list.label: Select Destination Cluster
list.name: DestinationCluster
list.query:

reachability_test_results rtr join organizations o on o.organization_id = rtr.organization_id 
where o.organization_name  IN ('$OrganizationName') and
rtr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and
rtr.host_name in ($HostName)

list.definition:
select distinct rtr.test_id from reachability_test_results rtr join organizations o on o.organization_id = rtr.organization_id
and o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and rtr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and rtr.host_name in ($HostName)
list.label: Select Test ID
list.name: TestId
list.query:
select distinct rtr.test_id from reachability_test_results rtr join organizations o on o.organization_id = rtr.organization_id
and o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and rtr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and rtr.host_name in ($HostName)
